source.name: Brace Expansion
source.instructions: Click the button below to submit your response.
source.guidance:
We can create file with brace expansion using the touch command.

```
touch file_{1..5}.{gif,png,jpg}
```

Similarly, we can use the `rm` command to remove files with brace expansion.
```
rm file_{1..5}.{gif,png,jpg}
```

sequence.feedback: Be sure to use touch and brace expansion to create files
Be sure to use rm and brace expansion to remove all files
